House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01640
FULL TITLE : AN ACT SEPARATING THE DON BOSCO HIGH SCHOOL (PARAQUE NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL-DON BOSCO EXTENSION) IN BARANGAY DON BOSCO, CITY OF PARAQUE FROM THE PARAQUE NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL , CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS DON BOSCO NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR

DATE FILED : 2016-07-18
SIGNIFICANCE: LOCAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:

          -DepED
      2. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-03-14
      3. Approved by the Committee on 2017-03-14
      4. Transmitted to the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-04-05
      5. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-02
      6. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-02
          -Approved pursuant to Section 44 of the Rules of the House of Representatives, 17th Congress, without amendment.
      7. Committee Report filed on 2017-05-29
